TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示充当子元素集合的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that act as containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: 此控件的子级支持 ，并且在可以按行和列进行遍历的二维逻辑坐标系统中进行组织。

span.span: The children of this control support and are organized in a two-dimensional logical coordinate system that can be traversed by row and column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持活动网格; 的操作控件模式是此功能所必需的。 does not support active manipulation of a grid; the control pattern is required for this functionality. 请参阅[Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md)有关的可能支持此控件模式的控件示例。See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may support this control pattern.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

related.span: 实现 UI 自动化 Grid 控件模式

span.span: Implementing the UI Automation Grid Control Pattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用来获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，根元素被传递给一个函数，返回的 UI 自动化元素的子代的根并符合一系列属性条件集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of UI Automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须是从与以获取当前值的引用。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用获取，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取任何属性的当前值引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用以获取以前使用指定的属性的缓存的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其使用的信息，请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement GetItem(int32 row, int32 column) cil managed
Public Function GetItem (row As Integer, column As Integer) As AutomationElement

span.span: The ordinal number of the row of interest.
The ordinal number of the column of interest.

summary.span: 检索表示指定单元格的 。

span.span: Retrieves an that represents the specified cell.
An that represents the retrieved cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 网格坐标都从零开始的坐标为 (0，0) 的左上角 （或右上角单元格，具体取决于区域设置）。Grid coordinates are zero-based with the upper left (or upper right cell depending on locale) having coordinates (0,0). 如果单元格为空，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素仍返回为了支持检索该单元格的属性。If a cell is empty, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is still returned in order to support retrieval of the property for that cell. 这可在网格中的子元素的布局是类似于未对齐的数组，如下所示。This is possible when the layout of child elements in the grid is similar to a ragged array as shown here. ![Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。] (~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows 资源管理器视图显示未对齐的布局。")![Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.](~/add/media/uia-gridpattern-ragged-array.PNG "Windows Explorer view showing ragged layout.") 坐标为空的 Grid 控件的示例Example of a Grid Control with Empty Coordinates ## Examples 在以下示例中，侦听器声明以跟踪网格容器内的网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 项属性被回显到控制台每次焦点更改事件时。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus change event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

exception.span: 请求的行坐标或列坐标小于零。

span.span: Either the requested row or column coordinate is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 请求的行坐标大于 或列坐标大于 。

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式标识符传递到方法，如来检索从指定的控件模式感兴趣的。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在以下示例中，从 UI 自动化元素获取控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在以下示例中，根元素被传递给一个函数，返回的自动化元素的子代的根并符合一系列属性条件集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. 此示例检索支持的 UI 自动化元素但当前在树中具有只有一个项。This example retrieves the UI Automation elements that support but currently have only one item in the tree.
